channel.title: eobox on Ben's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in eobox on Ben's Blog

item.title: Satellite imagery classification - III
item.description: Introduction Context and goal This is the third and last part of a blog post series about using remote sensing data to classify the earth’s surface. In this post we will finally walk through the typical steps it takes to classify remote sensing images with a supervised classifier to derive a land use/land cover map. We will make use of the remote sensing data from the first part of the series and the OpenStreetMap (OSM) data from the second part of the series.
